data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 150,975 believers in Cuanza Sul and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Cuanza Sul, Angola
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Cuanza Sul, Angola that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.section_summary: On average, 42 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Cuanza Sul, Angola.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Cuanza Sul.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Cuanza Sul, Angola find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 502,124 lost in Cuanza Sul that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Cuanza Sul, Angola the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Cuanza Sul, Angola.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight
